transcript: Hi, Mark from Sales Corp here. Thanks for the detailed feedback on the trial. I'm glad your team found the automation features helpful. You mentioned scaling to multiple departments - our enterprise plan is designed exactly for that. The SSO integration would streamline access for all users. And yes, we can customize the workflows for each department. The volume discount would bring significant savings. Ready to proceed with the enterprise rollout? Excellent! Let me walk you through the next steps.
